docs.snippet: Through a program called Aspire Football Dreams, the Qataris had scouted hundreds of thousands of young African players; needing a place where the best youths could play professionally, they found it in a team in a small Belgian town....
docs.lead_paragraph: Through a program called Aspire Football Dreams, the Qataris had scouted hundreds of thousands of young African players; needing a place where the best youths could play professionally, they found it in a team in a small Belgian town.
docs.abstract: Executives from Qatar's Aspire Academy acquire KAS Eupen, Belgian soccer team; lure for Belgian team, on verge of financial ruin, is money; attraction for Academy executives is more complex; Qataris had scouted hundreds of thousands of young African players, since 2007, in hopes of bringing the best of them to academy for development as professional soccer players (Series: Seeding The Field).

headline.main: Qatari Soccer Empire Buys a Foothold in Europe
headline.print_headline: Qatari Soccer Empire Buys a Foothold in Europe
